title: The Kardashian/Jenner clan share their skincare and makeup tips
text:
Kim Kardashian West says she gets her famous pout by overlining her lips with a darker lip liner.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star and her siblings have been sharing their beauty tips with the world, giving some easy to do hacks to achieve their looks.

"I love overlining my lips with a darker lip liner," Kim tells her sister Kourtney Kardashian's Poosh.

The famous sister's mother, Kris Jenner, also shared her skincare secrets, saying, "Wash your face every night using a hot Terry cloth washcloth. It acts as a natural exfoliant by loosening dead skin cells".

Kylie Jenner also has a way to keep your spray tan on for longer. She says, "To make a spray tan last longer, moisturise with body lotion every day - my Kylie skin body lotion is my go-to."

Compiled by Phelokazi Mbude.

Sign up to W24’s newsletters so you don't miss out on any of our stories and giveaways.
description: Kim Kardashian West says she gets her famous pout by overlining her lips with a darker lip liner.
